00020    * Default constructor.
00021    */
00022    PointSymmetry::PointSymmetry()
00023     : R_()
00024    {
00025       int i, j;
00026       for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00027          for (j = 0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00028             R_(i, j) = 0;
00029          }
00030       }
00031    }

00033    /*
00034    * Copy constructor.
00035    */
00036    PointSymmetry::PointSymmetry(const PointSymmetry& other)
00037    {
00038       int i, j;
00039       for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00040          for (j = 0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00041             R_(i, j) = other.R_(i,j);
00042          }
00043       }
00044    }

00046    /*
00047    * Make identity (private static method).
00048    */
00049    void PointSymmetry::makeIdentity()
00050    {
00051       int i, j;
00052       for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00053          for (j = 0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00054             if (i == j) {
00055                identity_.R_(i, j) = 1;
00056             } else {
00057                identity_.R_(i, j) = 0;
00058             }
00059          }
00060       }
00061    }
00062 
00063    /*
00064    * Return inverse of this PointSymmetry.
00065    */
00066    PointSymmetry PointSymmetry::inverse() const
00067    {
00068       PointSymmetry C;
00069       int i, j;
00070       for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00071          for (j = 0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00072             C.R_(i, j) = R_(j, i);
00073          }
00074       }
00075       return C;
00076    }

00078    /*
00079    * Assignment operator.
00080    */
00081    PointSymmetry& PointSymmetry::operator = (const PointSymmetry& other)
00082    {
00083       if (this != &other) {
00084          int i, j;
00085          for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00086             for (j = 0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00087                R_(i, j) = other.R_(i,j);
00088             }
00089          }
00090       }
00091       return *this;
00092    }

00094    /*
00095    * Equality operator.
00096    */
00097    bool operator == (const PointSymmetry& A, const PointSymmetry& B)
00098    {
00099       int i, j;
00100       for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00101          for (j = 0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00102             if (A.R_(i, j) != B.R_(i,j)) {
00103                return false;
00104             }
00105          }
00106       }
00107       return true;
00108    }

00110    /*
00111    * Group multipication operator for PointSymmetry objects.
00112    */
00113    PointSymmetry operator * (const PointSymmetry& A, const PointSymmetry& B)
00114    {
00115       PointSymmetry C;
00116       int i, j, k;
00117       for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00118          for (j = 0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00119             C.R_(i, j) = 0;
00120             for (k = 0; k < Dimension; ++k) {
00121                C.R_(i, j) += A.R_(i, k)*B.R_(k, j);
00122             }
00123          }
00124       }
00125       return C;
00126    }
00127 
00128    /*
00129    * Matrix / IntVector multiplication.
00130    */
00131    IntVector operator * (const PointSymmetry& S, const IntVector& V)
00132    {
00133       IntVector U;
00134       int i, j;
00135       for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00136          U[i] = 0;
00137          for (j = 0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00138             U[i] += S.R_(i,j)*V[j];
00139          }
00140       }
00141       return U;
00142    }
00143 
00144    /*
00145    * IntVector / Matrix multiplication.
00146    */
00147    IntVector operator * (const IntVector& V, const PointSymmetry& S)
00148    {
00149       IntVector U;
00150       int i, j;
00151       for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00152          U[i] = 0;
00153          for (j = 0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00154             U[i] += V[j]*S.R_(j,i);
00155          }
00156       }
00157       return U;
00158    }

00160    /*
00161    * Output stream inserter for a PointSymmetry.
00162    */ 
00163    std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& out, const PointSymmetry& A)
00164    {
00165       int i, j;
00166       for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00167          for (j = 0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00168             out << Int(A.R_(i,j));
00169          }
00170          out << std::endl;
00171       }
00172       return out;
